body_html: I use 64 images with 96x96 size for training now, 2 720P images require 6 times more memory. This network has 16 layers for generation and 10 layers for discriminator, does each layer duplicates the image batch tensor? So I need to cut some layers or use a better GPU?

body: I use 64 images with 96x96 size for training now, 2 720P images require 6 times more memory. This network has 16 layers for generation and 10 layers for discriminator, does each layer duplicates the image batch tensor? So I need to cut some layers or use a better GPU?
